thread.title: Independent MLA Engineer Rashid protests outside J&K Assembly
thread.title_full: Independent MLA Engineer Rashid protests outside J&K Assembly

author: Aamir Salati | India.com News Desk
title: Independent MLA Engineer Rashid protests outside J&K Assembly
text:
Independent MLA Engineer Rashid protests outside J&K Assembly By India.com News Desk on October 9, 2015 at 11:40 AM Comments Independent MLA from Langate Sheikh Abdul Rashid aka Engineer Rashid on Friday morning protested outside Jammu and Kashmir Assembly along with his supporters. The MLA protested over the attack on him by Bharatiya Janata Party legislators. On Thursday, the on-going session of Jammu and Kashmir Assembly witnessed argument that eventually resulted in a scuffle between MLA Engineer Rashid and BJP legislator Ravinder Raina. Engineer Rashid had on Wednesday held a beef party in the lawns of MLA hostel, a day after which Assembly was scheduled to take up the bill on the beef ban in the valley. Engineer Rashid began protesting this morning and till last reports came in his supporters were detained by the police. Independent MLA Engineer Rashid protests outside J&K Assembly over yesterday’s incident, supporters detained. pic.twitter.com/Eo4i4Q1Biy 
— ANI (@ANI_news) October 9, 2015 After Engineer Rashid’s brawl with Ravinder Raina opposition party, National Conference came in support of the independent MLA. Former Chief Minister Omar Abdullah said, “Our sentiments are also attached to this issue… We don’t force our religion on you. My religion prohibits consumption of alcohol and pork… Do I assault everyone who eats pork or alcohol.” BJP MLA later told the press that Engineer Rashid violated the constitution of J&K. “Engineer Rashid provoked Hindus of the world and Jammu and Kashmir by doing what he did. What he did was a violation of Constitution of Jammu and Kashmir. He said in the Assembly that he will hold 1000 more parties like this,” said Ravinder Raina. 
  11:55 AM Topics:
